choose_number: Choose your number of the autospins
change_bet_msg: Changing a bet change your progress. You can have different progress levels at a different stakes on the same game.
home_msg: Are you sure you want to leave?
swipe_mode_msg: Use swipe to spin the reels
input_description: When this mode is activated press the spacebar once to spin or twice to fast stop. Also you can change the bet by using the arrow keys.
swipe_mode_description: When this mode is activated: spin is played with a swipe down.
balance_description: Displays your account balance. Click Balance to open the Bet settings menu.
bet_description: Displays the bet value for a spin. Click Bet to open the Bet settings menu. By clicking the Bet settings (coins+gear) button you can open the bet settings interface and set your bet value.
bet_description_mobile: Displays the bet value for a spin. Click Bet to open the Bet settings menu.
bet_settings_description_mobile: By clicking the Bet settings (coins+gear) button you can open the bet settings interface and set your bet value.
win_description: Displays the win for the current spin or the last win payout.
autoplay_description: Click the Autospin button to open the Autospins settings interface and choose the number of autospins and additional conditions to stop autospins. The selected number of spins starts automatically with the same bet value as the spin whereby the autospins mode is activated. You may click the Autospin button anytime again to stop autospins. Click the Spin button to speed up reel animation.
paytable_description: Displays all multipliers for each symbol combination, description of the game features and all information about the paylines.
settings_description: By clicking the Settings button you can open the game settings interface to change the sound, input and visual settings.
rules_swipe_mode_description: Swipe down to spin the reels.
calculate: How to calculate the combination win
calculate_description:
Count the number of identical symbols located on the adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one.
Check the multiplier for the corresponding numbers of symbols shown in the Paytable.
Payline win is equal to the coefficient multiplied by the bet.
Only the highest win per payline is paid.
randomization_description: The reels are spun with a fair and equal chance for each stop position by a random number generator. For more information, visit http://evoplay.games/RNG.
additional_info_description: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
objective_is: The objective is to spin the reels so that the symbols form the winning combinations on the existing paylines.
winning_combination: A winning combination of identical symbols is formed in sequence from the most left to right reel. The more identical symbols are formed successively, the greater the win.
required_number: The required number of symbols to create a winning combination, win coefficient and paylines are displayed in the Paytable.
spin_description: When you are ready to submit your bet click Spin to start the game. The bet amount is deducted from your balance and the game round is started.
home_description: Exit the game and return to the platform on which you play.
burger_description: Open the sidebar options interface, where you may turn the sound on/off, turn on/off the turbo mode and enter/exit fullscreen. Also located on the sidebar are buttons for: rules, paytable, history and settings.
burger_description_mobile: Open the sidebar options interface, where you may turn the sound on/off, turn on/off the turbo mode. Also located on the sidebar are buttons for: rules, paytable, history and settings.
rules_description: Displays a full description of the game rules and features.
history_description: By clicking the History button you can review and replay your last game rounds. Updating the history list may take some time.
collect_msg: By clicking on this button, you will restart the game and return to Start.
max_win: RTP ${rtp}%, Highest probability of winning: ${min} in ${max}
session_close: There was a problem, please try again.
server_error_0: Internal error. Please reopen the game.
restore_popup: Game session restored from the last round.
statistics_description: By clicking the Statistics button, you can view your game statistics: number of rounds played, net win, total amount staked, total amount won, and the time spent in the game.
